project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A comprehensive portal to improve customer onboarding, adoption, and success.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in securely using their existing credentials
Seamless integration with the main SaaS product

feature_breakdown.description: Display onboarding checklists tailored to the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Checklists are accurately generated based on the customer's subscription tier
Checklists provide clear, step-by-step guidance for new users

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to enable seamless content search and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily search and access all relevant product documentation
Knowledge base content is displayed in a user-friendly manner

feature_breakdown.description: Display personalized dashboards showing the customer's usage and adoption metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboards provide a clear, at-a-glance view of key adoption metrics
Dashboards are responsive and accessible on various devices

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily contact their CSM with relevant customer information
Tickets are automatically created in the Zendesk system

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> Web Application -> API Gateway -> Microservices -> Database/Third-Party Systems -> Response to Web Application
security_considerations: Implement rate limiting and DDoS protection

implementation_phases.description: Initial release of the COSP with core onboarding and self-service features.
deliverables: Integrated with Identity Provider, Knowledge Base API, and Subscription Management System

implementation_phases.description: Release the adoption metrics dashboard and integrate with the usage tracking system.
Implement the 'Contact CSM' feature and integrate with the CRM and Zendesk.

risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with third-party vendors early, establish clear communication and SLAs

risk_analysis.description: Complexity in developing personalized onboarding checklists
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time and resources, implement robust content management system

risk_analysis.description: Scalability issues with the adoption metrics dashboard
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Design the system for high concurrency and efficient data processing

infrastructure_needs: AWS hosting (EC2, RDS, API Gateway, Lambda)
Secure VPN for third-party API access

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
Increase to 40% of support questions resolved via the portal
